extendedInfo.description: MyFitness calculator is simple application for your entire daily fitness requirement (Calorie and Nutrition).The fastest and easiest to use Calorie and Nutrition intake calculator for Android.MyFitness calculator Includes:-â¢ TDEE Calculator = (Total Calories intake calculator ) How many calories should you be consuming each day?â¢ IIFYM (If It Fits your Macros) Macros Nutrients Calculator - How many grams of Carbohydrate, Protein, and Fat should you be eating at each meal? â¢ BMI  Calculatorâ¢ BMR Calculator = Basal Metalbolic Rateâ¢ One Rep Maxâ¢ Tablet-optimized UI â¢ Metric and imperial systems are supportedâ¢ Optional saving of last entered values â¢ Calculate all major nutrients: calories, fat, protein, carbs, â¢ Body Mass Index( BMI ): is defined as the body weight divided by the square of the height.  BMI  provides a rough guide since it doesn't take into account a persons build or the composition of the body weight. Just enter your weight and height and get the BMI value and also your ideal weight range. -BMI can be used to find your healthy weight if you want to lose weight or are on diet. TDEE is the amount calories your body burns in a 24 hour period, sleeping, working, exercising, playing and even digesting food!The  IIFYM TDEE Calculator is designed to give you your exact TDEE based on a few key factors (BMR + TOTAL ENERGY EXPENDITURE).TDEE is the most important bit of information available to us when trying to gain muscle or burn fat and lose weight which is why the IIFYM TDEE Calculator is based on the most exact TDEE formulas available. Fat Weight Loss Secret â¢ If we eat more calories than our body requires, we will gain weight watchers.â¢ If we eat less calories than our body needs, we will lose weight watchers.â¢ Unless we know exactly what our TDEE is, we have no way of knowing how many calories to consume to burn    body fat or gain muscleFind out how many calories you need and use MyFitnessPal or any other Calorie Counter or  Calorie tracker app to track your calories.BMR = Basal Metalbolic Rate (similar to RMR = Resting Metabolic Rate)Your BMR is represents the number of calories your body burns at rest. The  BMR calcualtor will calculate the precise amount of calories your individual body requires to keep you alive.The BMR Calculator is not a TDEE Calculator so you should not base any dietary decision on the number our BMR calculator spits out

reviews.title: Simple app
reviews.comment: Does what it states, fast and easy to use. Could do with more information on diet macro ratios. Like how many grams of p/c/f each person should intake.
reviews.author: Samantha Chan

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I\'d love to see rmr and tdee as well
reviews.author: Justin Melendez

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Very simple app. Shows you maintain lose weight or how many calories to bulk up.
reviews.author: Zenia Mendez

reviews.comment: There should be cardio related calculation as well as in max heart rate recommended heart rate etc BUT KEEP UP THE QUALITY\tAwesome app and accurate for me.
reviews.author: sajid hassan

reviews.title: BEST MACRO CALCULATOR
reviews.comment: I was searching webpages to do these calculations and now I can do all of that on my phone. Great way to adjust your macros as you lose/gain weight every week. This can help break the Plateau especially in fat loss. Great app
reviews.author: Nagulan Jaidev

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: I\'d like to see a way to figure in every single rep of every single excercise. I\'ve yet to see an app that does that for lifting specifically.
reviews.author: Emory Causey

reviews.title: Awesome fitness app.
reviews.comment: Must have app for fitness enthusiast.
reviews.author: Sudhir Khanger

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Except for minor problems with large font sizes, it is perfect and it does exactly what it says it says though. I would gladly pay a free dollars to lose the ads and for a dark theme that is easier on the eyes and battery.
reviews.author: Steve Meiers

reviews.title: It works good, make sure you fill all requared fields
reviews.comment: First attempt was not good, forgot to fill exercise field, and to loose weight had to consume 1462 calories, which is so much under my macros, miss one field, want to rate one star, then tried again, and numbers looks good. Stick to those numbers!
reviews.author: Denis Smirnov

reviews.title: What the...
reviews.comment: Apparently my body needs 11000 calories per day... what a crock of crap.
reviews.author: Tettenhall PC

reviews.title: Good and accurate
reviews.comment: Wish I had this app 5 years ago
reviews.author: Reggie Fowler
